content: So early in the morning, he delivered <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>{随机数值1}</style> pieces of <style=Highlight>{随机文本值1}</style></style> to each customer.
Then he set out again and delivered <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>{随机数值2}</style> pieces of <style=Highlight>{随机文本值2}</style></style> to each customer. Finally, it was all done...
{选项数值1}
{A拍手}<style=SizeBig>Nice job, you got it!</style> It's <style=Highlight>{正确数值}</style> pieces of <style=Highlight>{随机文本值1}</style>!
{选项数值1}
{选项数值2}
{选项数值3}
{A拍手}<style=SizeBig>Nice job, you got it!</style> It's <style=Highlight>{正确数值}</style> <style=Highlight>{随机文本值2}</style>!
So...{短暂停} how many packages did the courier prepare in total?

{A摊手}Uh-oh, that's not it.
The correct answer is <style=Highlight>{正确数值}</style> packages!
So... {短暂停}what kind of item was not included in the deliveries?
Artwork
Clothing

{A摊手}Uh-oh, that's not it.
The correct answer is <style=Highlight>{正确文本}</style>!
{随机文本值1}
Both
{A拍手}<style=SizeBig>Nice job, you got it!</style> It's <style=Highlight>{正确文本}</style>!

{A拍手}<style=SizeBig>Nice job, you got it!</style>
Both items had the same quantity!
<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, have you ever played the story memory game? I'll tell a story, and then ask a related question to see if you can recall the details!
Today, Loomi's PuffPost courier got <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>{随机数值3}</style></style> delivery orders.
So...{短暂停} how many pieces of <style=Highlight>{随机文本值2}</style> did the courier prepare in total?
{选项数值2}

{A拍手}<style=SizeBig>Nice job, you got it!</style>
It's <style=Highlight>{正确数值}</style> packages!

{A拍手}<style=SizeBig>Nice job, you got it!</style>
It's <style=Highlight>{正确文本}</style>!

So...{短暂停}
which item had the highest quantity in the deliveries?

{A摊手}Uh-oh, that's not it.
The correct answer is <style=Highlight>{正确文本}</style>!
{A笑眯眯}Listen carefully... I'm starting now!
{A摊手}Along the way, he was chased by a dog and battered by the wind... After struggling back, he found out—there were still packages left!
So...{短暂停} how many pieces of <style=Highlight>{随机文本值1}</style> did the courier prepare in total?
{选项数值2}
{选项数值3}

{A摊手}Uh-oh, that's not it.
The correct answer is <style=Highlight>{正确数值}</style> pieces of <style=Highlight>{随机文本值1}</style>!

{A摊手}Uh-oh, that's not it.
The correct answer is <style=Highlight>{正确数值}</style> pieces of <style=Highlight>{随机文本值2}</style>!
{选项数值1}
{选项数值3}
Furniture
{随机文本值2}

{A摊手}Uh-oh, that's not it.
The correct answer is that both items had the same quantity!
